definition: (interj.) ha!/(onom. for laughter)/(slang) to be infatuated with/to adore/abbr. for 哈士奇[ha1 shi4 qi2], husky (dog)

sentences.english: Helen: Hello, I'm calling from San Francisco for Kevin Lee.
sentences.chinese: 哈囉，我是舊金山方面的，找李凱文。

sentences.english: Hello, I'm calling from San Francisco for Kevin Lee .
sentences.chinese: 哈囉，我從舊金山打來找李凱文。

sentences.english: Receptionist: Hello, Twin Tower Hotel. How may I help you?
sentences.chinese: 哈囉您好，雙塔飯店。有什麼我能爲您服務的嗎？

sentences.english: Hello? Hello? Oh! Rachel, it's Paolo calling from Rome.
sentences.chinese: 哈囉？哦，瑞秋，是保羅從羅馬打來的。

definition: (literary) I trust you have been well since we last met
prologue of play/opening remarks/preamble (of speeches, articles etc)
overwhelmed by favor from superior (humble expr.)
Wakin Chau (1960-), HK-born Taiwanese singer and actor
Garfield (comic strip cat created by Jim Davis)
to climb a wall/(fig.) to be unfaithful
to request sb to do sth/please!
I'm sure we'll meet again some day. (idiom)/Hope to see you again.
